name: Glotzgi
description:
You play as a Cube, Glotzi, which is very hungry and wants to eat fruits all day.  That's what you do. Eat the Apples, Bananas and Tomatoes, but be careful! The tomatoes hurt you! And the bananas... well, you'll see (don't worry, you wont get hurt). The apples are just normal food.

Also, please read the whole readme file.
